fields.name: ScreenText9

Please populate the qualification fields and confirm that the information is up-to-date.

fields.name: ScreenText15

fields.name: ScreenText2
fields.fieldText:
• Wenn du ein Wettbewerber Feld mit No Competitor oder Unknown ausfllst, drfen die anderen leer bleiben. Ansonsten musst du alle 3 ausfllen

validationRule.errorMessage: Please confirm that qualification fields are updated.

fields.name: Error1
fields.fieldText: There was an error when we tried to update your account. Please reach out to an Admin and provide the following details:

fields.name: Copy_2_of_Error1
fields.fieldText: There was an error when we tried to create the opportunity. Please go back and try again or reach out to an Admin and provide the following details:

fields.name: ScreenText12
fields.fieldText: Your opportunity was created successfully but we encountered some errors:

fields.name: ErrorScreenContactRoleCreation2
fields.fieldText: The contact role could not be created. Please try to do it manually or reach out to an Admin.

fields.name: varErrorDemoEventCreation2
fields.fieldText: The demo event could not be created. Please try to do it manually or reach out to an Admin.

fields.name: ErrorScreenAccUpdate2
fields.fieldText: The account could not be updated, please check if it is assigned to the correct owner and Lifecycle Stage is Acquisition. If not, please reach out to an Admin.

fields.name: ScreenText8
fields.fieldText: Select where you want to go after closing this window or stay where you are.

fields.name: Copy_2_of_Copy_1_of_Error1
fields.fieldText: There is no contact related to this account. Please create a new contact or relate an existing contact to the account.

fields.name: Do_you_want_to_create_an_Opportunity_with_or_without_a_Demo_Event
fields.fieldText: Do you want to create an Opportunity with or without a Demo Event?

fields.name: ScreenText5
fields.fieldText:
Opportunity with Demo Event

A demo event will be created automatically and you will be defined as Demo set by User.

  • If the Stage is Scheduled, you will be the Opp Owner.
  • If the Stage is Demo Confirmed or Pitch & Negotiation, the Demo Hunter will be the Opp Owner.

Opportunity without Demo Event

You will be the Opp Owner.

fields.name: ScreenText6
fields.fieldText: If empty, Probability and Forecast Category will be set according to stage.

fields.name: not_a_new_customer
fields.helpText: Zeigt an, ob die Acquisition Opportunity zu einem Bestandskunden gehrt. Sollte auf TRUE (checked) gesetzt werden, wenn es sich bei dem Account, um einen Bestandskund*in und nicht um einen Neukund*in handelt. Wenn das Feld auf TRUE gesetzt ist, wird die Opportunity aus dem Pilot-Tracking ausgeschlossen.

fields.name: Demo_Influence
fields.helpText:
Markiert Demos, die nicht aus der regulren Demo Verteilung stammen, sondern von anderen Faktoren beeinflusst wurden.

Decentralized Efforts: Arbeit an einem gemeinsamen Projekt, das sich darauf konzentriert, eine Unternehmensstruktur aufzubrechen.

Team Effort: Arbeit an einem gemeinsamen Projekt, das sich auf eine Branche und deren Unternehmen konzentriert. Zustzlich gemeinsamer Fokus auf Ziel Accounts aus der Pipeline eines Account Executives oder aus dem CRM.

Confluence Dokumentation

fields.name: Demo_Event_Description
fields.helpText: This will automatically be added to the created demo event

fields.name: ScreenText7
fields.fieldText:
The Salesforce demo event will be created for the Demo Hunter on the Demo Date and will be linked to the contact selected on the previous screen.

This will not replace the event creation via YCBM!

fields.name: ScreenText11
fields.fieldText: Contact Role Selection

fields.name: ScreenText
fields.fieldText:
Please select one contact to be added as contact role to the new opportunity and select a role name.

(We can currently only create one contact role)

Please note that this list only contains contacts that are directly or indirectly related to the account. If a contact does not show up, please link it as primary or related contact to the account.
